Package ie.davidloftus.huffman.tree

Class HuffmanTree

  • java.lang.Object
    • ie.davidloftus.huffman.tree.HuffmanTree
  • public class HuffmanTree
extends java.lang.Object
    HuffmanTree holds the tree and codebook for encoding/decoding characters. Can be generated from data using generateFromInput() or read from a previously serialized file using readFromFile().

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field Description
      static int BITS_PER_WORD

        Writes a serialized HuffmanTree to a BitOutputStream.

        Throws:

      • generateFromInput

        public static HuffmanTree generateFromInput​(byte[] inputData)
        Generates a new HuffmanTree that is optimal for a given input.
        Parameters:
        inputData - the input to optimize the tree for
        Returns:
        a HuffmanTree that will minimally encoded inputData

      • getNextWord

        public int getNextWord​(BitInputStream inputStream)
                throws java.io.IOException
        Get next whole character from bitstream.
        Parameters:
        inputStream - bitstream to read from
        Returns:
        a single byte as an int
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - if an io error occurs while reading
        java.io.EOFException - if there aren't enough bits

      • getBitsForWord

        public BitString getBitsForWord​(int b)
        Get the bitstring that represents a given byte.
        Parameters:
        b - the byte to encode
        Returns:
        a bitstring that would decode to b
